Head: Sensation of a band around head; cannot keep hat on
Skin of forehead tense
Fear of falling when standing up
Violent vertigo, as if everything turned around
Buzzing in ears; better in open air
Respiratory: Cough, with burning and prickling in respiratory tracts
Extremities: Weight and lassitude in limbs, especially the SHOULDERS
Burning in hollow of right hand
Drawing pain in thumb and big toe

name: Primula veris
Relationship: Compare: CYCLAMEN; RANUNC.; OENOTHERA - Evening Primrose - (exhausting, watery diarrhoea; cholera infantum; hydrocephaloid); PRIMULA FARINOSA - the wild Primrose - (dermatitis, especially on index fingers and thumbs).
details: Cerebral congestion, with neuralgia; migraine; rheumatic and gouty pains.
